title: Has any one noticed longer delays with the client?
body:
ok, so since before the new ranked champ select system, i could pick a champ and it would acknowledge it Straight away (well like 0.25 seconds).

Now for some reason there is like a 1 second delay ( like if you quickly switch between two champs there is a noticeably longer delay)

Am i just paranoid, or has something changed in the client to add this delay.


{{champion:26}}
